projects.title: CoursePros. | Course App
projects.description: CoursePros is a web application where instructors can create courses and upload classes, while students can seamlessly browse, purchase, and take classes through a simple and smooth UI. Developed using Next.js, PostgreSQL, and Razorpay for payment integration, this platform offers features like an instructor dashboard, streamlined payments, and a focus on security and user experience. This project allowed me to gain hands-on experience in building a full-fledged course marketplace, emphasizing a user-friendly interface and robust security measures.

projects.title: Instagram | Social Media App
projects.description: Instagram Clone is a full-stack social media web application developed using React.js, Express.js, WebSockets, and other modern technologies. This project replicates core features of Instagram, including real-time chat with followers and following, uploading posts, and sharing reels. Through this project, I gained insights into the workings of real-time communication and learned how to implement real-time functionalities effectively. The application is designed to provide a seamless user experience while showcasing modern web development techniques.

projects.title: 50xOpportunities | Job Portal
projects.description: 50xOpportunities is a job portal web application that connects job seekers with employers. The platform allows users to browse job listings, apply for jobs, and post job openings. Developed using TypeScript, React, Prisma, and PostgreSQL, this project showcases my skills in building a full-stack application with a focus on user experience and functionality. The application features a clean and intuitive UI, making it easy for users to navigate and find relevant job opportunities.
projects.tags: TypeScript, ReactJs,HonoJs, Prisma,Cloudlfare Workers, zustand, PostgreSQL, TailwindCSS/ShadcnUI/AcertinityUI

projects.title: Anonymous Comments | Feedback App
projects.description: { Anonymous Comments } | Feedback App is a web application that allows users to share feedback and comments anonymously. The platform is designed to provide a safe space for users to express their thoughts and opinions without revealing their identity. Developed using TypeScript, Next.js, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS, this project showcases my skills in building a full-stack application with a focus on user privacy and security. The application features a clean and retro UI, making it easy for users to share feedback and comments anonymously.
projects.tags: TypeScript, NextJs, MongoDB, TailwindCSS/ShadcnUI,Resend(Email Auth),Gemini(AI suggested Messages)

projects.title: Medium | Blog App
projects.description: Medium Clone is a full-stack blog web application developed using React.js, HonoJs, Cloudflare Workers, and other modern technologies. This project replicates core features of Medium, including creating and publishing articles. Through this project, I gained insights into building a full-fledged blog platform and learned how to implement features like user authentication, authorization, and data validation effectively. The application is designed to provide a seamless user experience while showcasing modern web development techniques.
projects.tags: React, HonoJs, Cloudflare workers, Zod, TypeScript, Prisma(ORM), PostgreSQL, JsonWebToken, Markdown Editor

projects.title: Repay | Paytm Wallet Clone
projects.description: Repay is a Paytm wallet clone web application developed using ReactJs, NodeJs, HonoJs, and other modern technologies. Through this project I gained insights into building a full-fledged wallet platform and learned how to P2P transactions, user authentication, authorization, and data validation effectively. The application is designed to provide a seamless user experience while showcasing modern web development techniques.
projects.tags: ReactJs, NodeJs, HonoJs, Prisma,PostgreSQL, JsonWebToken, TailwindCSS, Zod, TypeScript
